IsBusy is a helpful application designed and built by an Software developer called Gasmyr. The purpose of IsBusy is to help you delegate some tedious work to you smartphone and indeed gain lot of time. Time is Money.
Which of this SIM is set in your phone to be the first?
Message to send if someone text you
Message to send if someone make a call
IsBusy purpose is to help you managed your time
